title: His Beguiled Bride
description: She’s my patient.A girl who walks into my office with shiny eyes and cascading hair and tells me all her secrets.She trusts me, sees me as her white knight but little does she know that I harbor a deep obsession for her.My heart is in her custody, beats for her with every breath she takes but I know I can’t make her mine. Until one day, an opportunity arises and I seize it without thinking.Now I’ve crossed the line but if a man enters paradise once, there is no way he won't keep on going.
author: Ever Lilac
